titles.title: Fairness and Equity Tax Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a minimum tax on certain foreign or foreign controlled corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1993--Introduced. Fairness and Equity Tax Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an additional minimum tax on: (1) a domestic corporation which is 25 percent foreign-owned; or (2) a foreign corporation engaged in a trade or business within the United States.
